name: Swiftclaw

aspects.high_concept: Infamous Sabre Cat That Hunts Like a Ghost
aspects.trouble: Territorial Fury — It Will Not Flee Its Lair
other_aspects: Wounded Pride Makes It More Dangerous

stunts: Pounce: +2 to Fight when attacking from Stealth or when Swiftclaw moves into a zone and attacks in the same exchange.
Raking Claws: Swiftclaw’s attacks are Weapon:2.
Predator’s Patience: Use Stealth to Create Advantage even while observed if the environment has cover.
combat_tactics: Hit-and-run until it smells blood, then commits. Uses terrain and fear. If cornered, becomes brutally direct.
gm_notes: Make this fight cinematic and lethal. Swiftclaw should feel like a named boss: stealth pressure, sudden pounce, and a brutal close.
